subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick had no answers for Roger Federer’s sublime tennis Thursday.  The world’s top-ranked player easily defeated the American to book a spot in his seventh consecutive Grand Slam final.
snippet: Andy Roddick had no answers for Roger Federer’s sublime tennis Thursday.  The world’s top-ranked player easily defeated the American to book a spot in his seventh consecutive Grand Slam final.
